title: (x) Corporate Font: Bain & Company (Consulting Firm) - similar to Futura {Jan}
content:
Please help with identifying this Sans Serif font, and the spacing (-65 etc) used!  
Thanks!

[http://www.bain.com/bainweb/publications/global\_private\_equity\_report\_20...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150105202045/http:/www.bain.com/bainweb/publications/global_private_equity_report_2010.asp?ref=home "http://www.bain.com/bainweb/publications/global\_private\_equity\_report\_2010.asp?ref=home")

author: wolfyserver

comments.content: Futura with a custom ‘C’ in the logo.
Is there a version of Futura that maintains the pointed joins beyond a medium weight?
